flixel.tile.FlxTilemapBuffer

type
class
A helper object to keep tilemap drawing performance decent across the new multi-camera system. Pretty much don't even have to think about this class unless you are doing some crazy hacking.

Constructor

new(TileWidth : Int, TileHeight : Int, WidthInTiles : Int, HeightInTiles : Int, ?Camera : flixel.FlxCamera, ?ScaleX : Float, ?ScaleY : Float)
parameters
TileWidth The width of the tiles in this tilemap.
TileHeight The height of the tiles in this tilemap.
WidthInTiles How many tiles wide the tilemap is.
HeightInTiles How many tiles tall the tilemap is.
Camera Which camera this buffer relates to.
Instantiates a new camera-specific buffer for storing the visual tilemap data.

Instance Variables

columns : Int

How many columns of tiles fit in this buffer.

dirty : Bool

Whether the buffer needs to be redrawn.

forceComplexRender : Bool

height : Float

The height of the buffer (usually just a few tiles taller than the camera).

pixels(accessor,null) : flash.display.BitmapData

rows : Int

How many rows of tiles fit in this buffer.

width : Float

The width of the buffer (usually just a few tiles wider than the camera).

x : Float

The current X position of the buffer.

y : Float

The current Y position of the buffer.

Instance Methods

destroy() : Void

Clean up memory.

draw(Camera : flixel.FlxCamera, FlashPoint : flash.geom.Point, ?ScaleX : Float, ?ScaleY : Float) : Void

parameters
Camera Which camera to draw the buffer onto.
FlashPoint Where to draw the buffer at in camera coordinates.
Just stamps this buffer onto the specified camera at the specified location.

fill(?Color : UInt) : Void

parameters
Color What color to fill with, in 0xAARRGGBB hex format.
Fill the buffer with the specified color. Default value is transparent.

updateColumns(TileWidth : Int, WidthInTiles : Int, ?ScaleX : Float, ?Camera : flixel.FlxCamera) : Void

updateRows(TileHeight : Int, HeightInTiles : Int, ?ScaleY : Float, ?Camera : flixel.FlxCamera) : Void
